algorithm_technique: Simulate the senator's banning process using queues to manage senator indices and their turn order.
problem_summary_simple: Predict which political party will win a senate vote based on senator banning rights.
problem_summary_technical: Use queues to manage senator indices, simulating bans by re-queueing with an incremented index to represent the next round.
key_insights: The optimal strategy for each senator is to ban the next available senator of the opposing party.
Queues naturally handle the round-robin nature of the voting process.
Adding 'n' to the index of a senator who survives a round effectively places them in the next round.
